findings.Description: S3 bucket versioning should be enabled to help recover from both unintended user actions and application failures.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: S3 bucket versioning is not enabled

findings.Description: EC2 instances should not have a public IPv4 address associated. Use VPC endpoints or NAT gateways instead.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: EC2 instance has public IP address

findings.Description: CloudTrail should be enabled in all regions to ensure complete API activity logging.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: CloudTrail trail is not enabled in all regions

findings.Description: VPC Flow Logs analysis detected abnormal outbound traffic pattern to known malicious IP 203.0.113.45 from private subnet.
findings.Title: Unusual outbound traffic to suspicious IP address

findings.Description: VPC Flow Logs indicate systematic port scanning from instance attempting connections to multiple ports across subnet range.
findings.Title: Port scanning activity detected
